title: Legendary Whitetails Men's Harbor Heavyweight Flannel Shirt
description: [Features]: Pencil pocket slot, 2 chest pockets with flaps; one with button closure, and locker loop locker for easy storage
[Durable Quality]: Heavyweight 8.7 oz button up long sleeve flannel shirt is constructed with high quality materials making it rugged and durable
[Reinforced]: Lightly waxed cotton trim on pocket flap and elbows; the thickness of the shirt provides warmth for layering in cooler weather
[Adjustability]: Adjustable cuffs make it easy to roll up your sleeve or tighten them to fit you perfectly
[Comfortable]: Nothing beats the long-lasting comfort of 100% all-natural cotton; super-soft wash feels broken-in and comfortable from day one

One of our heaviest flannel shirts with a super soft wash that gives you a worn in feeling from day one. Add the lightly waxed cotton trims for durablity and this shirt can double as a shirt jacket. Wear it on its own or layer it up. Big & Tall sizes are designed for men over 6'2" and add 2" in body length and 1-1⁄2" in sleeve length.
